title: 311. Andy, Vaughn & DJ CTI: Environmentalist Groups Sue Biden, Compensation For Side Effects & Capitol Police's Jan. 6th Warning
itunes:title: 311. Andy, Vaughn & DJ CTI: Environmentalist Groups Sue Biden, Compensation For Side Effects & Capitol Police's Jan. 6th Warning
description: In today's episode, Andy, Vaughn & DJ discuss environmentalist groups suing the Biden administration to block more than 3,500 oil and gas permits, a BC man receiving compensation for a vaccine-related injury, and an email warning the capitol police about violence two weeks before the Jan. 6th riots.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy, Vaughn & DJ discuss environmentalist groups suing the Biden administration to block more than 3,500 oil and gas permits, a BC man receiving compensation for a vaccine-related injury, and an email warning the capitol police about violence two weeks before the Jan. 6th riots.
